description: Try our easy to follow Carrot, Pea & Broad Bean Risotto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Carrot, Pea & Broad Bean Risotto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 liters vegetable stock, heated to simmering
100g frozen broad beans, defrosted and peeled
1 handful flat leaf parsley, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the butter with the oil in a saucepan, add the onion, carrots and garlic and cook for about 3 minutes until soft. Add the rice and stir until coated with the butter mixture. Add the wine and cook rapidly, stirring, until it has evaporated.

Add the hot stock, a ladleful at a time, and cook, stirring constantly, until each addition has been absorbed before adding the next. Continue until all the stock has been absorbed and the rice is creamy and cooked but still retains a little bite - this will take around 15 minutes.
Add the peas and broad beans and heat through for 3-5 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the Parmesan and parsley. Season to taste with salt and pepper and serve immediately.
